response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $8,000 by us due to its unique features, durability, and the expertise that went into its creation. We believe it could be an invaluable addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we kindly propose a purchase price of $7,500. Should you decide to proceed with this offer, we assure you a seamless transaction and excellent customer service. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 7500}
